UNIS Radio
Because we can!

Welcome

Radio UNIS is the official radio stations of the United Nations International School. The broadcasts are produced by UNIS High School students. Each broadcast includes an introduction, a segment of announcements and news from the UNIS Tut House, as well as a rotating segment which will usually be an interview or discussion. As of now the shows are broadcasted over the internet and can be found on YouTube, SoundCloud and soon on iTunes.

Shows

  • Radio UNIS! #1 - 05 Nov 2014
